Push.summary: Pushes (uploads) a file to the remote device.
Push.param: A that contains the contents of the file.
The path, on the device, to which to push the file.
The permission octet that contains the permissions of the newly created file on the device.
The time at which the file was last modified.
A that can be used to cancel the task.

Pull.summary: Pulls (downloads) a file from the remote device.
Pull.param: The path, on the device, of the file to pull.
A that will receive the contents of the file.
A that can be used to cancel the task.

Stat.summary: Returns information about a file on the device.
Stat.param: The path of the file on the device.
Stat.returns: A object that contains information about the file.

GetDirectoryListing.summary: Lists the contents of a directory on the device.
GetDirectoryListing.param: The path to the directory on the device.
GetDirectoryListing.returns: For each child item of the directory, a object with information of the item.
